attributes.description:
KIA SEDONA 2WD 2.2D AT 7SEATER SXL
Beautiful 2018 Sedona in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbags, aircon, power steering with controls on steering wheel. Radio with bluetooth and USB as well as Aux port for your phone. Two sunroofs, automatic dual sliding doors, automatic transmission and diesel fuel. Gives a smooth and comfortable drive for you and your family. This spacious Sedona has height adjustable seats, foldable seats at the back and a caramel interior that goes perfectly with the white body. It has a reverse camera and sensors in the front and rear to assist with parking. Visit your Konfidence dealership in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this beauty for a test drive. Nationwide delivery.
